XI.iii.1.B.3.d
.
NSC Burial Allowance and the Transportation Benefit
PL 116-315
significantly impacted when the transportation benefit may be paid.  For deaths that occurred on or after January 5, 2023, any claimant who would be eligible to receive the NSC burial allowance based on a Veteran’s death may also be
eligible
for the transportation benefit if they incurred transportation expenses.
For deaths that occurred before January 5, 2023, eligibility for the transportation benefit in addition to the NSC burial allowance
may
exist when the Veteran is buried in a national or covered Veterans’ cemetery or died while under VA care as listed in
38 CFR 3.1706
.
Reference
:  For more information on the transportation benefit, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, 1.B.6
.
